    Authenticate apps to Azure services by using service principals and managed identities for Azure resources - Authentication with service principals in Azure AD

    1. Which three items does a custom app need to authenticate with an Azure AD application?

      Tenant ID, application ID, and object ID

      Object ID, application ID, and authentication key

      Tenant ID, public key, and authentication key

      Tenant ID, application ID, and authentication key


    2. What service is called when your application passes a token to Azure?

      Azure Active Directory (Azure AD)

      Azure Resource Manager

      Azure REST API

      The service principal application
